articles.author: Luisa Anderson
articles.title: Is your local Starbucks closing? - KGW
articles.description: Starbucks announced the immediate closure of hundreds of stores in the U.S., Canada and Europe — impacting more than a dozen locations in Oregon.
articles.content:
PORTLAND, Ore. Some Oregonians may have to look elsewhere to get their pumpkin spice lattes this fall. 
On Thursday, Starbucks announced the immediate closure of hundreds of stores in the U.S., Cana… [+1708 chars]
